titles.title: To regulate fishing in certain waters of Alaska.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1712)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 8/11/1994--Introduced. Permits local residents who are descendants of Katmai residents who lived within the boundaries of Katmai National Park, Alaska, subject to reasonable regulations established by the Secretary of the Interior, to continue their traditional fishery for red fish in the Naknek Lake-Naknek River and Brooks River and Iliuk Arm within such Park.
